author: Special Correspondent
text:
Sansar Chand, Central Excise Commissioner, held a meeting with the jewellers association here on Wednesday in the wake of apprehension expressed by them on the one per cent excise duty imposed on jewellery by the Central government. The meeting was organised to drive home the important aspects of the levy and clarify doubts.

The Commissioner informed them that the Centre had decided to constitute a sub-committee to interact with trade and industry on tax laws. He said the associations would be given an opportunity to represent before the committee and submit a representation. The committee would submit its report within 60 days of its constitution.
title: Excise Commissioner holds meeting with jewellers
